verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329>Musician,<s%> <S%H4905>Maschil,<s%> for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7141>Korah.<s%> As the <S%H354>hart<s%> <S%H6165>panteth<s%> <S%H5921>after<s%> the <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H650>brooks,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> <S%H6165>panteth<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H413>after<s%> thee, O <S%H430>God.<s%>

My <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H6770>thirsteth<s%> for <S%H430>God,<s%> for the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H410>God:<s%> <S%H4970>when<s%> shall I <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H7200>appear<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H430>God?<s%>

My <S%H1832>tears<s%> have <S%H1961>been<s%> my <S%H3899>meat<s%> <S%H3119>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night,<s%> while they <S%H3605>continually<s%> <S%H3117><s%> <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H346>Where<s%> is thy <S%H430>God?<s%>

When I <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> things, I pour <S%H8210>out<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> me: <S%H3588>for<s%> I had <S%H5674>gone<s%> with the <S%H5519>multitude,<s%> I <S%H1718>went<s%> with them <S%H5704>to<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> with the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H7440>joy<s%> and <S%H8426>praise,<s%> with a <S%H1995>multitude<s%> that kept <S%H2287>holyday.<s%>

Why <S%H4100><s%> art thou cast <S%H7817>down,<s%> O my <S%H5315>soul?<s%> and why art thou <S%H1993>disquieted<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> me? <S%H3176>hope<s%> thou in <S%H430>God:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I shall <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H3034>praise<s%> him for the <S%H3444>help<s%> of his <S%H6440>countenance.<s%>

O my <S%H430>God,<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> is cast <S%H7817>down<s%> <S%H5921>within<s%> me: <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> will I <S%H2142>remember<s%> thee from the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> and of the <S%H2769>Hermonites,<s%> from the <S%H4480>hill<s%> <S%H2022><s%> <S%H4706>Mizar.<s%>

Deep <S%H8415><s%> <S%H7121>calleth<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H8415>deep<s%> at the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of thy <S%H6794>waterspouts:<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H4867>waves<s%> and thy <S%H1530>billows<s%> are <S%H5674>gone<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> me.

Yet the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H6680>command<s%> his <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> in the <S%H3119>daytime,<s%> and in the <S%H3915>night<s%> his <S%H7892>song<s%> shall be <S%H5973>with<s%> me, and my <S%H8605>prayer<s%> unto the <S%H410>God<s%> of my <S%H2416>life.<s%>

I will <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H410>God<s%> my <S%H5553>rock,<s%> <S%H4100>Why<s%> hast thou <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> me? <S%H4100>why<s%> <S%H1980>go<s%> I <S%H6937>mourning<s%> because of the <S%H3906>oppression<s%> of the <S%H341>enemy?<s%>

As with a <S%H7524>sword<s%> in my <S%H6106>bones,<s%> mine <S%H6887>enemies<s%> <S%H2778>reproach<s%> me; while they <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H3605>daily<s%> <S%H3117><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H346>Where<s%> is thy <S%H430>God?<s%>

Why <S%H4100><s%> art thou cast <S%H7817>down,<s%> O my <S%H5315>soul?<s%> and <S%H4100>why<s%> art thou <S%H1993>disquieted<s%> <S%H5921>within<s%> me? <S%H3176>hope<s%> thou in <S%H430>God:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I shall <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H3034>praise<s%> him, who is the <S%H3444>health<s%> of my <S%H6440>countenance,<s%> and my <S%H430>God.<s%>
